title: Nukeproof Bolted Accessory Strap secures spares to your top tube for packless riding
content:
Nukeproof have released a bolted frame strap for securing spares to the top tube of the Mega and Giga enduro bikes. Actually, it can be used on any bike that has mounting holes for an accessory plate or unused bottle cage mounts, helping almost all mountain bike riders go pack-free for those quick post-work summer [â€¦]

The post Nukeproof Bolted Accessory Strap secures spares to your top tube for packless riding appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
